verbs.description: U.S. President Donald Trump [V: has] been nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his efforts in reaching an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula .
U.S. President Donald Trump has [V: been] nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his efforts in reaching an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula .

[ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump] has been [V: nominated] [ARG2: for the Nobel Peace Prize] [ARGM-CAU: for his efforts in reaching an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
U.S. President Donald Trump has been nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his efforts in [V: reaching] [ARG1: an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
U.S. President Donald Trump has been nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his efforts in reaching an agreement to [V: work] [ARG1: toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
